pkgmetadata.longdescription: Internal Validation of Clinical Prediction Models // Conduct internal validation of a clinical prediction model for a binary outcome. Produce bias corrected performance metrics (c-statistic, Brier score, calibration intercept/slope) via bootstrap (simple bootstrap, bootstrap optimism, .632 optimism) and cross-validation (CV optimism, CV average). Also includes functions to assess model stability via bootstrap resampling. See Steyerberg et al. (2001) doi:10.1016/s0895-4356(01)00341-9; Harrell (2015) doi:10.1007/978-3-319-19425-7; Riley and Collins (2023) doi:10.1002/bimj.202200302.
